meta.title: IVPN Pricing - VPN subscription with anonymous registration

pricing.title: Select IVPN Plan
pricing.description: Select a plan to create your account instantly. You can switch between IVPN Standard and Pro any time in the future.
pricing.productFooterPrice: All prices are in U.S. dollars.
pricing.productFooterReview: Review pricing for business or nonprofit teams
pricing.feature2: Open-source applications for Android, iOS, macOS, Windows and Linux
pricing.feature3: Cash, Monero and Bitcoin payment options for better anonymity
pricing.feature7: Killswitch/firewall and obfuscation methods where applicable
pricing.trustList1: No logs, regularly audited VPN service
pricing.trustList5: Strong ethics: no trackers, no false promises, no surveillance ads

login.title: Log In
login.enterCaptcha: Please enter the captcha you see above:

account.greetingsText: Please make sure you save your Account ID in a safe place, you will use it to connect to the VPN. You don't need to enter your email to use our service.
account.continueToPayment2: To start using IVPN add funds to your account.
account.qrScan: Scan from our mobile apps for quick setup.
account.safeReferenceDescription: Safe reference ID can be used when communicating with support engineers by email.

wireguardTab.title: WireGuard
wireguardTab.description1: If you are using the IVPN Apps for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android or iOS, WireGuard keys are managed automatically, simply select the WireGuard protocol in the app settings.
wireguardTab.description2: If you are using the native WireGuard client then you need to manually create your keys and the necessary configuration files. We provide a configuration file generator that will generate WireGuard keys, allow you to specify the servers you require and other parameters. You simply import the configuration file and are ready to connect.
wireguardTab.manuallyConfigure: If you wish to manually configure WireGuard and just need to submit a new public key then use the form below.
wireguardTab.noWireguardKeys: There are no WireGuard keys added manually for this account.
wireguardTab.renewAccount: Please renew your account to manage WireGuard keys.
wireguardTab.configStep1Content: A private and public key pair will be generated within the browser. The private key will be included in the config file that you download. Only the public key is sent to our server. You can review the code on
wireguardTab.configStep2Title: 2. Select one or multiple exit servers
wireguardTab.configStep2Content: A separate configuration file will be generated for each location that you include.
wireguardTab.configStep3Content: You may need to configure a custom port if you are behind a restrictive firewall.
wireguardTab.vpnTunnelTrafficDesc: By default, you will receive both an IPv4 and IPv6 address. You can specify if you wish to receive only IPv4 or IPv6 address.
wireguardTab.dnsSettingsNote1: When AntiTracker is enabled, IVPN blocks ads, malicious websites, and third-party trackers using our private DNS servers.
wireguardTab.aboutHow: about how IVPN AntiTracker is implemented.
wireguardTab.dnsSettingsNote2: Hardcore mode blocks the leading companies with business models relying on user surveillance (currently: Google and Facebook).
wireguardTab.pleaseEnter: Please enter a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.

deviceManagementTab.disabledDesc1: When enabled, you can review devices logged into the service and remotely log them out as needed.
deviceManagementTab.disabledDesc2: We recommend securely storing device identifiers with encryption to identify and disconnect devices when you don't have access to them.
deviceManagementTab.disabledDesc3: Learn more about this feature and its potential privacy implications
deviceManagementTab.enabledDesc1: You are currently not logged in to the service on any device.
deviceManagementTab.enabledDesc2: to the IVPN app to add a device. Once added, your device identifiers will appear on this page.
deviceManagementTab.increaseDeviceLimit: To increase your device limit to
deviceManagementTab.disablePopupDesc1: Please note - after disabling Device management:
deviceManagementTab.disablePopupDesc2: You won’t be logged out from your devices.
deviceManagementTab.disablePopupDesc3: You won’t be able to manage your devices on your dashboard.
